scripts.db:generate: docker compose exec apps pnpm --filter @family-tree-app/backend db:generate
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec apps with-env pnpm --filter @family-tree-app/backend db:migrate
scripts.db:seed: docker compose exec apps pnpm --filter @family-tree-app/backend db:seed
scripts.db:studio: docker compose exec apps pnpm --filter @family-tree-app/backend db:studio
scripts.quality:frontend: docker compose exec apps pnpm --filter @family-tree-app/frontend quality
scripts.quality:backend: docker compose exec apps pnpm --filter @family-tree-app/backend quality
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml apps/*/node_modules apps/*/dist apps/*/.nuxt apps/*/.output .turbo
